entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow early this morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 this morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
